articles.description: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank has increased fixed deposit interest rates on various tenures with effect from March 8, 2023. The new rates apply to Platina FDs, domestic deposits, recurring deposits, and NRE-fixed deposits.
articles.content: Ujjivan Small finance Bank has revised fixed deposit interest rates on various tenures with effect from March 8, 2023, as per the bank s website. The revised rates are applicable on Platina FD, Domes… [+3651 chars]

articles.author: Shivani Tiwari
articles.title: Stocks to buy: Tata Steel, ITC, IDFC First Bank, Airtel, Wipro, Ashok Leyland among 10 shares for up to 37% return - Zee Business
articles.description: Stocks to buy: Brokerage firms have recommended stocks- Tata Steel, ITC, Airtel, Wipro, Ashok Leyland, IDFC First Bank, HDFC Bank, Mahindra & Mahindra, Tata Consumer Products and Tata Motors having the potential to yield up to 37 per cent.
